caseTitle: Water and Sanitation Agency, Lahore thr. its Managing Director v. Lotte Akhtar Beverages (Pvt) Ltd, Lahore & others
tagline: Any flaws or deficiencies in the steps taken by the Provincial Governments for the enforcement of this Court's directions for the conservation of the water resource of the country given in the proceedings of SMC No. 26 of 2018  are to be highlighted before the Implementation Bench of this Court.
